companyValues.title: Innovation
companyValues.description: We constantly seek new ways to solve problems and improve our solutions

companyValues.title: Collaboration
companyValues.description: We work together as one team to achieve extraordinary results

companyValues.title: Excellence
companyValues.description: We deliver high-quality work and strive for continuous improvement

companyValues.title: Integrity
companyValues.description: We act with honesty and transparency in all our interactions

companyValues.title: Customer Focus
companyValues.description: We put our customers at the center of everything we do

firstWeekSchedule.activities: Welcome meeting with HR, office tour, IT setup, meet your team
Department overview, project briefings, development environment setup
Code review process training, security protocols, pair programming session
Customer meeting observation, product demo, stakeholder introductions
First sprint planning, goal setting with manager, team lunch

policies.title: Work Hours
policies.description: Core hours 10 AM - 3 PM, flexible schedule around core hours

policies.title: Remote Work
policies.description: Hybrid model: 3 days in office, 2 days remote per week

policies.title: Code Review
policies.description: All code must be reviewed by at least one peer before merging

policies.title: Time Off
policies.description: Unlimited PTO policy with manager approval and 2-week advance notice

policies.title: Professional Development
policies.description: $2,000 annual budget for conferences, courses, and certifications

benefits.description: 100% premium coverage for employee, 80% for family
Equity participation program for all employees
Gym membership reimbursement, mental health support
